inclusion.criterion: SCS implanted for at least 2 months before study start date
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: currently receiving pain relief from SCS usage
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing to participate in a 9-week study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least 20% of battery life remaining in spinal cord stimulator
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: pregnant or intends to become pregnant during the course of the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: strong untreated dependency on prescription medication such as benzodiazepines and narcotic analgesics
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: coexisting clinically relevant or disabling chronic pain problem not treated by SCS
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a healthy woman with no underlying disease. She has been receiving pain relief from SCS usage and is willing to participate in the study.
